nodes.text: Vis was associated with an individual who held the title Earl of Vis. A cousin of the old king of the planet Naboo, the earl built a banqueting rotunda in Naboo's capital city of Theed.

Vis was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 24th issue of the De Agostini magazine Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon, published in 2015. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, Vis was first mentioned in the 2000 reference book Inside the Worlds of Star Wars: Episode I by Kristin Lund, and was depicted as a city in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds.
